name: Bird attack in the city
description:
Bird attack in the city is game made for minijam 99:   https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-99-birds 

The limitation was Can't stop moving, so you can't stop moving. You can only choose direction for moving.

How to

You are the giant bird monster. Use WASD or arrow keys to choose direction for walking. Destroy buildings to get better score. Humans are also trying to kill you. You can destroy them by going over them.

All models, code and sounds are made by me.
